metadata.title: CVE-2023-25512 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for Linux and Windows contains a vulnerability incuobjdump, where an attacker may cause an out-of-bounds memory read byrunning cuobjdump on a malformed input file. A successful exploit of thisvulnerability may lead to limited denial of service, code execution, andlimited information disclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
